Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.virtualview

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.virtualview.VirtualView
public class VirtualView extends Object
VirtualView class is a simplified representation of the gameBoard (and the expert gameBoard). It will update itself according to the state of the model each time an update event is emitted.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor VirtualView creates a new VirtualView instance.
